ModMetaData.name: FogWorld
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
A toggleable Harmony patch that prevents all non-foggy weather from occurring, for that Silent Hill atmosphere.

You can also enable an optional patch that lowers the lighting level during fog. This can even be enabled independently from the main patch!

Any weather that is forced will still be allowed to occur.

-Requires Harmony.
-Preview image photo taken by Paul Gilmore, @pueblovista.
